name: Exxon Mobil tokenized stock (xStock)
description: Exxon Mobil xStock (XOMx) is a tracker certificate issued as Solana SPL and ERC-20 tokens. XOMx tracks the price of Exxon Mobil Corporation (the underlying). XOMx is designed to give eligible cryptocurrency market participants regulatory-compliant access to the stock price of Exxon Mobil Corporation, whilst maintaining the benefits of blockchain technology. ExxonMobil is a multinational oil and gas corporation that operates in over 100 countries.
